K10D0328_H0332:389a-1: nanda pra pra dzy'a s'u tra /
K10D0328_H0332:389a-3: dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo /
K10D0328_H0332:389a-4: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0328_H0332:389a-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
K10D0328_H0332:389a-6: bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas kyi nya gro dh'ai
K10D0328_H0332:389b-0: kun dga'i ra ba na bzhugs @389b so; ;de nas
K10D0328_H0332:389b-1: bcom ldan 'das snga dro chos gos dang /
K10D0328_H0332:389b-3: lhung bzed bsnams nas phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K10D0328_H0332:389b-4: ser skya'i gnas su bsod snyoms la gshegs so //
K10D0328_H0332:389b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs pa dang /
K10D0328_H0332:389b-6: rigs kyi bu dga' bos bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo //
K10D0328_H0332:389b-7: mthong nas kyang rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das
K10D0328_H0332:389b-8: kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces gsol
K10D0328_H0332:389b-14: gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol /
K10D0328_H0332:389b-16: de nas rigs kyi bu dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal te /
K10D0328_H0332:389b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10D0328_H0332:389b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0328_H0332:389b-23: rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don ci lags /
K10D0328_H0332:389b-24: bcom ldan 'das gis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0328_H0332:389b-25: sdig pa thams cad yongs su spong ba yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:389b-28: gti mug rab tu sel ba yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390a-5: g-yo'i nu pas bsdus pa'i dri ma thams cad 'khru ba yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390a-6: lo tog thams cad kyis gzhi lta bur yon tan thams cad kyi gzhi yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390a-7: rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390a-8: bde ba thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390a-9: yin tan thams cad kyi go 'phang gi gnas yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390a-10: sems can thams cad dbugs 'byin pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390a-11: 'byung po thams cad kyi yid brtan pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390a-12: srog chags thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390a-13: sems can dbul po thams cad kyi bum pa bzang po yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390a-14: skyabs med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390a-15: kun tu tshol bas phongs pa dang /
K10D0328_H0332:390a-16: sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa rnams kyi bstis yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390a-17: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma 'dres pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390a-18: sems can thams cad kyi mchod par bya ba yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390a-19: mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390a-20: thar pa 'gro ba rnams kyi lam yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390a-21: sems can dag pa rnams kyi bsnyen par bya ba yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390a-22: snod du gyur pa rnams kyis bsten par bya ba yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390a-23: ngan song gi sgo gcod pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390a-25: thar pa'i sgo 'byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390a-26: lha'i 'gro ba rnams kun tu 'grengs pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-0: sdug bsngal thams cad kun tu @390b gcod pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-1: sred pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa rnams rnam par grol bar byed pa yin te /
K10D0328_H0332:390b-3: de ni rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-4: yang dag pa'i lta ba'i khyim yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-5: thar pa'i yang dag par sdom pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-6: mya ngan las 'das pa la bsnyen pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-7: rgyun nye bar gcod pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-8: nyon mongs pa rnams sreg pa yin no; ;phra rgyas rnams 'byin pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-9: lta ba ngan pa'i dra ba rnams 'jig par byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-10: bdud kyi rgyal mtshan snyol ba yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-11: bzod pa smra ba sgreng ba yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-12: 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ldog par byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-13: chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-14: nu zho'i rgya mtsho skems pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-15: rus pa'i ri 'jig par byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-20: phung po'i khur 'joms pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-21: nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba rnams 'byin pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-22: khyim gyi gzeb tu bcing pa rnams rnam par grol bar byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-23: gnod pa'i tshor ba rnams zad par byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-25: nyon mongs pa'i dri ma brtan por gyur pa rnams gcod pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-26: rga shis 'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-28: bral bzad par byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:390b-29: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gtses pa rnams kyi bde ba dang /
K10D0328_H0332:391a-2: 'dod pa'i khams las rgal bar byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391a-3: gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par rgal bar byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391a-4: gzugs med pa'i khams las rnam par rgal par byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391a-5: de dam par mya ngan las 'das pa mchog thob par byed pa yin te /
K10D0328_H0332:391a-7: de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba'o //
K10D0328_H0332:391a-8: 'jig rten thams cad kyi mig lta bu yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391a-9: gti mug gi mug pa'i sgron ma yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391a-10: rgyud dag par byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391a-11: nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391a-12: lam stor ba rnams la lam kun tu ston pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391a-13: chos thams cad kyi de kho na ston pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391a-14: mdud pa thams cad rnam par grol bar byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391a-15: ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391a-16: mi shes pa'i rab rib kyi sgrib ba'i mun pa rnams 'dral bar byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391a-17: le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la rtsom par byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391a-18: tshul khrims la ltung ba rnams skyo bar byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391a-19: tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391a-20: brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams mchog tu dga' ba yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391a-21: nang du yang dga' jog la mngon par dga' ba rnams rab tu dga' ba yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391b-0: rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mchog tu chog shes par byed @391b pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391b-1: nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'joms par byed pa rnams kyi mtshon cha yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391b-2: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams mchog tu rgyal bar byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391b-3: gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas so //
K10D0328_H0332:391b-4: skyo ba pa med pa rnams kyi skye ba pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391b-5: 'jigs pas 'brel ba rnams kyi mi 'jigs par byed pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391b-6: skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391b-7: sdug bsngal rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391b-8: 'khor ba'i 'ching bas bcings pa rnams 'grol bar byed pa yin te //
K10D0328_H0332:391b-10: de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o //
K10D0328_H0332:391b-12: mi rnams kyis bkur sti byas pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391b-13: mi'i dbang po rnams kyis mchod pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391b-14: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391b-15: khyim gyi gnas yongs su gtong ba yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391b-16: mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam 'dran pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391b-18: gos dur smrig ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rtags yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391b-19: rigs pa la brtson pa brtson 'grus kyi zhing yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391b-20: 'di ni drang spong rnams kyi rgyal mtshan yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391b-21: bdud sdig to can rnams kyi grags pa 'joms pa yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:391b-23: mi rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin te /
K10D0328_H0332:391b-25: rab tu byung ba ni de lta bu yin na ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung /
K10D0328_H0332:391b-27: rab tu byung ba ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal
K10D0328_H0332:391b-28: srid kyi bde ba bas kyang ches khyad par du
K10D0328_H0332:392a-2: dal ba thob pa ni bskal pas byed ba brgyar yang shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin te /
K10D0328_H0332:392a-3: sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni de bas kyang ches rnyed pa par dka' ba yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:392a-5: thar bar 'dod pa rgyal po'i drang srong rnams dang /
K10D0328_H0332:392a-7: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna
K10D0328_H0332:392a-8: bdun dang ldan pa rnams kyang btsun mo'i 'khor dang
K10D0328_H0332:392a-9: bcas te / sa bor nas rab tu byung ngo //
K10D0328_H0332:392a-10: de bzhin du khyim bdag dang /
K10D0328_H0332:392a-11: bram ze'i tshogs gzhan rnams kyang khyim rnams bor nas rab tu byung ngo //
K10D0328_H0332:392a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0328_H0332:392a-14: bdag ni khyim par mchis la sbyin pa dag stsal /
K10D0328_H0332:392a-16: bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la'ang bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing /
K10D0328_H0332:392a-21: yo byad rnams kyang bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K10D0328_H0332:392a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0328_H0332:392a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0328_H0332:392a-24: rdzogs pa'i pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis khams gsum pa
K10D0328_H0332:392a-25: gang dag yin pa'i 'jig rten gang bar gyur la
K10D0328_H0332:392b-0: rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can las lo ba rgyar 'di lta @392b ste; chos gos dang /
K10D0328_H0332:392b-4: yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed na /
K10D0328_H0332:392b-6: de ni rab tu byung bar nges par 'byung ba'i
K10D0328_H0332:392b-7: sems kyi bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do
K10D0328_H0332:392b-8: // dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung //
K10D0328_H0332:392b-9: dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' ste //
K10D0328_H0332:392b-10: dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa //
K10D0328_H0332:392b-11: ngal mi mnyes ma byed cig /
K10D0328_H0332:392b-14: sa chen po 'di chu gcig pur rgya mtshor gyur la /
K10D0328_H0332:392b-15: de na rus spal zhar ba gcig kyang yod /
K10D0328_H0332:392b-16: de na gnya' shing bug gcig pa gcig kyang rgya la rus spal zhar ba de /
K10D0328_H0332:392b-18: gnya' shing gi bu ga der mgrin pa chud par bya'o snyam du sems skye zhing /
K10D0328_H0332:392b-19: gnya' shing bu ga can de'ang rlung gis bskyod nas phyogs phyogs su rgyug par byed pa na /
K10D0328_H0332:392b-21: brgya la rkyen zhig gis rus spal zhar ba de'i
K10D0328_H0332:392b-22: mgrin pa gnya' shing gi bu ga der 'jug par
K10D0328_H0332:392b-24: mi nyid thob pa ni ma yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:392b-25: dal ba yun sum tshogs pa'ang de bzhin no //
K10D0328_H0332:392b-27: khyod kyis mi nyid shin tu rnyed pa dka' ba dang /
K10D0328_H0332:392b-28: bde bzhin du dal ba phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnyed na /
K10D0328_H0332:392b-31: dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed //
K10D0328_H0332:392b-32: dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur na //
K10D0328_H0332:392b-33: nga la mi mnyes ma byed cig /
K10D0328_H0332:393a-0: 'ga' zhig gis khab kyi mig gnam du bstan te yungs @393a *//
K10D0328_H0332:393a-1: kar gyi 'bru rnams 'thor bar byed na /
K10D0328_H0332:393a-3: brgya la rkyen zhig gis der yungs kar gyi 'bru gang yin pa gcig chud par 'gyur gyi /
K10D0328_H0332:393a-4: dga' bo; mi nyid rnyed pa ni ma yin no //
K10D0328_H0332:393a-5: dal ba phun sum tshogs pa'ang de bzhin no //
K10D0328_H0332:393a-7: mi nyid shin tu rnyed par dka' ba dang /
K10D0328_H0332:393a-8: de bzhin du dal ba phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnyed na /
K10D0328_H0332:393a-9: dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung /
K10D0328_H0332:393a-10: dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed //
K10D0328_H0332:393a-11: dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa //
K10D0328_H0332:393a-12: nga la mi mnyes ma byed cig /
K10D0328_H0332:393a-14: bskal ba bye ba stong dang ni //
K10D0328_H0332:393a-15: brgya dang khrag khrig dag tu yang //
K10D0328_H0332:393a-16: sangs rgyas sgra ni mi thos na //
K10D0328_H0332:393a-17: sangs rgyas mthong ba ga la zhig /
K10D0328_H0332:393a-18: au du ma b'a ra'i me tog ni //
K10D0328_H0332:393a-19: shing las shin tu rnyed dka' ltar //
K10D0328_H0332:393a-20: de bzhin sangs rgyas rnyed dka' ste //
K10D0328_H0332:393a-21: khyed kyis nga ni rnyed gyur na //
K10D0328_H0332:393a-22: dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung //
K10D0328_H0332:393a-23: dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' ste //
K10D0328_H0332:393a-24: dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa //
K10D0328_H0332:393a-25: ngal mi mnyes ma byed cig /
K10D0328_H0332:393a-26: de nas rigs kyi bu dga' bo skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos te /
K10D0328_H0332:393a-27: rgyal ba'i bstan pa la yang dag par dad pa
K10D0328_H0332:393a-28: kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung
K10D0328_H0332:393a-29: ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang /
K10D0328_H0332:393a-30: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K10D0328_H0332:393b-0: rigs kyi bu dga' bo bcom @393b ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10D0328_H0332:393b-1: dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so ////
